channel.title: Webclient Issue
channel.description:
Picture: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/97vho1.jpg[/img]
The Webclient works perfectly for me, but when I have friends try it, this is what they get. Can someone help please?
Try it out if it helps: http://www.evolution-pk.net/index.php?page=Webclient
Thanks,
Resent

item.title: Webclient Issue
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Resent, post:5, topic:412164”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=513419.msg3727671#msg3727671 date=1314398010]

Shut the fuck up, I’m not advertising, the link is there for educational purposes only and I think that’s obvious, no need for you to be involved in this.

The fuck is your deal? It’s not going to teach you shit and this is the wrong section. With an attitude like that you’ll never get help from fellow community members, plus he’s trying to help you so why wouldn’t he be involved? We aren’t here to be your personal slave and fix everything for you while you call us dicks. We don’t need anymore assholes like you on this site.
[/quote]

He knew for a fact that I wasn’t advertising, he was doing it to try and be spiteful so he could “maybe” someday become a moderator on the forums. No one else looks in the “client help” section. Then again, when I do look back I guess I was a bit harsh with my reaction, but still I don’t think it was necessary for him to post it.[/quote]Obviously it was necessary. I can guarentee being “Spiteful” was not what I was amiming for. My goal is to point the people who are to ignorant to read the section rule to the right direction. And no it wasn’t harsh. It was you flaming at me because i’m so “Spiteful.” I coulden’t care less about moderator on Mopar. I am here to help the community. And also just because no one looks at the Client Help section dosen’t mean you get special treatment and get to post in the section where people “Know” what they are doing. Clearly the rule is posted in the rules section. Although you may not know you were advertising (or you didn’t think you were) it is still advertising because you posted a link.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient Issue

The fuck is your deal? It’s not going to teach you shit and this is the wrong section. With an attitude like that you’ll never get help from fellow community members, plus he’s trying to help you so why wouldn’t he be involved? We aren’t here to be your personal slave and fix everything for you while you call us dicks. We don’t need anymore assholes like you on this site.[/quote]

He knew for a fact that I wasn’t advertising, he was doing it to try and be spiteful so he could “maybe” someday become a moderator on the forums. No one else looks in the “client help” section. Then again, when I do look back I guess I was a bit harsh with my reaction, but still I don’t think it was necessary for him to post it.
